title: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame) before it starts working. The tab key does not perform any action.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should navigate through the interactive elements.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Help view. 2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key. The tab key should not perform any action.
